hero.description: CachyOS is designed to deliver lightning-fast speeds and stability, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable computing experience every time you use it.

performance.title: Cutting-Edge Performance
performance.desc: Built on Arch Linux, CachyOS features the optimized linux-cachyos kernel utilizing the advanced BORE Scheduler for unparalleled performance.

optimized.title: Optimized Packages
optimized.desc: Packages compiled with x86-64-v3, x86-64-v4 and Zen4 instruction sets with LTO. Core packages get PGO or BOLT optimization.

desktop.title: Multiple Desktop Environments
desktop.desc: Choose from KDE Plasma, GNOME, XFCE, i3, Wayfire, LXQt, Openbox, Cinnamon, COSMIC, and many more during installation.

installer.title: Flexible Installation
installer.desc: Choose between a user-friendly GUI installer based on Calamares or a streamlined CLI-based option.

kernel.title: Robust Kernel Support
kernel.desc: Multiple scheduler options including BORE, EEVDF, sched-ext, ECHO, and RT. All kernels optimized for your CPU.

support.title: Support Our Efforts
support.desc: Your generosity is appreciated - Thank you for supporting our work in the open-source community.

desktop.title: Desktop Edition
desktop.desc: Empower your computing with a modern, customizable desktop environment. Browse, connect, manage files, and enjoy multimedia in a stunning interface.

handheld.title: Handheld Edition
handheld.desc: GameMode-like experience with preinstalled gaming tools. Supports ROG Ally, Steam Deck, Legion Go, and more.

download_page.title: Select Your Preferred Edition
download_page.subtitle: Choose from a range of Desktop Environments, Wayland Compositors and X11 Window Managers. Simply download and install using the online GUI ISO installer.

desktop.title: Desktop Edition
desktop.desc: Empower your computing with a modern, customizable desktop environment — browse the web, stay connected, manage files, and work efficiently.

handheld.title: Handheld Edition
handheld.desc: The CachyOS Handheld Edition provides a GameMode-like experience with preinstalled gaming tools. Supports ROG Ally, Steam Deck OLED and LCD, Legion Go, and Lenovo Legion Go S.

hero.title: About the Distribution
hero.description: CachyOS is a user-friendly and highly optimized distribution based on Arch Linux. Our distribution offers a seamless installation process and a range of customization options to personalize your computing experience. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced user, CachyOS delivers optimized performance while maintaining its simplicity.

vasiliy.role: Developer, Maintainer of ARU, CHWD, Settings

blog.title: Cachy Blog
blog.subtitle: Latest updates, releases and news from the CachyOS team

sponsors.title: Our Sponsors
sponsors.note: Thank you to all our sponsors for supporting CachyOS

footer.description: Blazingly Fast OS based on Arch Linux
